cfg_general.name: General settings
cfg_general.desc: Important: All settings apply only to the exp YOU share, received shared exp is unaffected by these settings.
cfg_sharetype.name: Exp sharing type
cfg_sharetype.desc:
Select exp sharing type
Tile - Players have to be within nearby tile range
Map - Players have to be on the same map
Global - Always share with all online players, regardless of distance
cfg_exptoactor.Name: Percentage of exp to you
cfg_exptoactor.Desc: Percentage of exp that you keep for yourself. The rest is shared between all nearby players
cfg_particlesection.name: Particle settings
cfg_expperparticle.name: Exp per Particle
cfg_expperparticle.desc: Spawns particles when this amount of exp is gained. Higher value means less particles. For example, if this setting is set to 3, then 1 particle spawns for every 3 exp, 2 particles spawn for every 6 exp etc.
cfg_shareallexpmaxlevel.Name: Share all exp at max level
cfg_shareallexpmaxlevel.Desc: Share all exp in skills you have max level in, instead of value given above.
cfg_nearbyplayertilerange.name: Nearby player tile range
cfg_nearbyplayertilerange.desc: Range of tiles around you where other players will share exp. Only applies to Tile sharing type.
cfg_overlay.name: Overlay Settings
cfg_overlaybutton.name: Toggle Tile Range Overlay
cfg_overlaybutton.desc: Toggle overlay to see Exp share range
cfg_overlayopacity.name: Overlay Opacity
cfg_enablefarming.name: Enable Farming
cfg_enablefarming.desc: Whether to enable exp sharing for farming skill
cfg_enablefishing.name: Enable Fishing
cfg_enablefishing.desc: Whether to enable exp sharing for fishing skill
cfg_enableforaging.name: Enable Foraging
cfg_enableforaging.desc: Whether to enable exp sharing for foraging skill
cfg_enablemining.name: Enable Mining
cfg_enablemining.desc: Whether to enable exp sharing for mining skill
cfg_enablecombat.name: Enable Combat
cfg_enablecombat.desc: Whether to enable exp sharing for combat skill
cfg_spacecore_generic.Name: Enable {{skill}}
cfg_spacecore_generic.Desc: Whether to enable exp sharing for {{skill}} skill
